explains: adj. 高出地面的，比（他物）高的；高尚的，睿智的；职位（或社会地位）高的；偏高的，高于正常的；欢欣的
v. 提拔，晋升；举起，抬起；提高，使升高（elevate 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: elevated temperature 高温；升高温度，提高温度
elevated railway n. 高架铁道

sentences.en: He was elevated to the post of president.
sentences.cn: 他被提拔到总裁的职位。

sentences.en: He elevated many of his friends to powerful positions within the government.
sentences.cn: 他将许多朋友都提拔到政府部门的要职上。

sentences.en: Within months she was elevated to ministerial rank.
sentences.cn: 不出几个月，她就被提升至部级。
